component.description: Calendar is an input component used to provide a date. Other than basic features calendar supports paging, localization, ajax selection and more.
component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &html_input_text_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
mindate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's minimum visible date.
maxdate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's maximum visible date.
pages false java.lang.Integer 1 Enables multiple page rendering.
mode false java.lang.String popup Defines how the calendar will be displayed. Default is popup
pattern false java.lang.String DateFormat pattern for localization.
locale false java.lang.Object Locale to be used for labels and conversion.
navigator false java.lang.Boolean false Enables month/year navigator. Default is false.
timeZone false java.lang.Object String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion, defaults to TimeZone.getDefault()
readonlyInput false java.lang.Boolean false Makes input text of a popup calendar readonly. Default is false.
showButtonPanel false java.lang.Boolean false Visibility of button panel containing today and done buttons. Default is false.
effect false java.lang.String Effect to use when displaying and showing the popup calendar.
effectDuration false java.lang.String normal Duration of the effect. Default is normal.
showOn false java.lang.String focus Client side event that displays the popup calendar.
showWeek false java.lang.Boolean false Displays the week number next to each week. Default is false.
disabledWeekends false java.lang.Boolean false Disables weekend columns. Default is false.
showOtherMonths false java.lang.Boolean false Displays days belonging to other months. Default is false.
selectOtherMonths false java.lang.Boolean false Enables selection of days belonging to other months. Default is false.
yearRange false java.lang.String Year range for the navigator, default is "c-10:c+10"
timeOnly false java.lang.Boolean false Shows only time picker without date.
stepHour false java.lang.Integer 1 Hour steps, default is 1.
stepMinute false java.lang.Integer 1 Minute steps, default is 1.
stepSecond false java.lang.Integer 1 Second steps, default is 1.
minHour false java.lang.Integer 0 Minimum boundary for hour selection. Default is 0.
maxHour false java.lang.Integer 23 Maximum boundary for hour selection. Default is 23.
minMinute false java.lang.Integer 0 Minimum boundary for minute selection. Default is 0.
maxMinute false java.lang.Integer 59 Maximum boundary for minute selection. Default is 59.
minSecond false java.lang.Integer 0 Minimum boundary for second selection. Default is 0.
maxSecond false java.lang.Integer 59 Maximum boundary for second selection. Default is 59.
pagedate false java.lang.Object Sets the initial date when value is not populated.
beforeShowDay false java.lang.String Callback to execute before displaying a date, used to customize date display.
mask false java.lang.String false Defines if a mask should be applied to the input field. Default value is "false" and valid values to enable are "true" that uses the pattern as the mask or a custom template. Refer to inputMask component for more information about custom templates.
timeControlType false java.lang.String slider Defines the type of element to use for time picker, valid values are "slider" , "select" and "custom"(with "timeControlObject" attribute).
beforeShow false java.lang.String Callback to execute before displaying calendar, element and calendar instance are passed as parameters.
maskSlotChar false java.lang.String PlaceHolder in mask template.
maskAutoClear false java.lang.Boolean true Clears the field on blur when incomplete input is entered.
timeControlObject false java.lang.String Client side object to use in custom timeControlType.
timeInput false java.lang.Boolean false Allows direct input in time field. Default is false.
showHour false java.lang.String Whether to show the hour control, valid values are "true" and "false".
showMinute false java.lang.String Whether to show the minute control, valid values are "true" and "false".
showSecond false java.lang.String Whether to show the second control, valid values are "true" and "false".
showMillisec false java.lang.String Whether to show the millisecond control, valid values are "true" and "false".
showTodayButton false java.lang.Boolean true Whether to show the "Current Date" button if showButtonPanel is rendered. Default is "true".
buttonTabindex false java.lang.String Position of the button in the tabbing order.
inputStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the input element. Used when mode is popup.
inputStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the input element. Used when mode is popup.
